extendedInfo.description: The turn-based strategy Copper Age moves us into a prehistoric epoch.You start with a squad of hunters surrounded by hostile tribes.You need to survive, get food, collect resources, train the army and conquer! You can disarm the hunters to make them construct buildings.Build fisheries to produce more food and granaries to save it for next turns.Collect wood, stone and copper to build the temples.There are four kinds of temples: - Temple of the Sun (to learn farming). After the learning you can build farms to increase food income.- Temple of War (military science). After the learning you can build Barracks and Armory to train peltasts and phalanx.- Temple of the Sea (naval science). After the learning you can build ships: raft, penteconter, trireme- Temple of Architecture. After the learning you can build palisades to protect your land and watchtower to expand the visible area.Each turn people of your tribe consumes food and breed.If there is no enough food the starvation decreases the population.Remained food can be stored for future in granaries.The people squads divide as soon as they get maximum number of members.If there is no space to divide the plague can happen.To prevent the overpopulation you can send people to the army, ships or temples.On the each map you have enemies managed by AI.The number of the enemy tribes depends of the map size.Your aim is to conquer them all!Also:- There is single player and local multiplayer modes (you can share the same device with your friends).- Games can be saved/loaded. - Autosaving works at the end of the each turn.- There are 4 maps for Britain area and 3 for Hellas area.The demo version has following restrictions in comparison with the full version:- only small maps- top technology levels are not available for Military Science, Naval Science and Farming.To get more information visit our site: www.copperagegame.comRead the detailed game manual: http://www.copperagegame.com/how_to_play/Frequently asked questions:http://www.copperagegame.com/faq/

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: But I can\'t figure a lot of it out...  Needs more detail and a more clear instructions.  A lot of promise though
reviews.author: crystal albright

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed this game, but it needs a lot more detail added in future updates.  I was able to figure things out fairly well, but perhaps a bit more detail on the graphic menu and tribe info screens would help.  Also, I would like to see more opportunity for strategy and/or storyline... good work, do keep it coming :-)
reviews.author: Makaii Melissa

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I enjoy it very much. One thing, when you have a map you like do not then click tutorial as it deletes your world. I has conqured england and wales and was threatening scotland, but I clicked it and I was back to square one. Over all I recomend this game, but I think the menu should be clearer or a warning should be added. Thank you to the makers!
reviews.author: dappy damian

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its good, but how do you build a farm? On which square?
reviews.author: lukasrossmanithable

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: Its a bit like the original warcraft/dune/command&conquer except its turn based ... civ?
reviews.author: Sandy Osterich

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t work out how to play a tutorial would be good
reviews.author: Podulike Garters

reviews.title: Not enough
reviews.comment: Has potential but at the moment there is not much to do. Interface is not user friendly even the tutorial helps some. Bottem line is there\'s not enough there to see what the real game is about. But keep on working on it. It could be a good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kinda confusing.
reviews.comment: I think I\'d like it more if I could figure out how to play it. There\'s really no explanation of controls. The most I can do is move a few squares and disarm my hunters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but..
reviews.comment: Very nice game but the soldier move on free will, and that ruins your strategy...

reviews.title: IT WON\'T LET me use the full version.

reviews.comment: Good game they should ww2 in there

reviews.title: One of a kind
reviews.comment: Sure its not like civilization but its not bad needs a little improvement it is better as a free game and sucks as a demo
